reviewText:
Leslie My wife started to use your tapes at about two year's ago . Normally she'll do about 45 to 60 min with you. I myself strarted to do them for a while then yard work got in my way so I couldn't do it as much as before. Recently I started to join her more with the excercises.
We still may not be able to do them all  , because we do have some limitations as far as our body goes. But we keep-up as bes as we can. We are trying to find a new dvd that you came out with but haven't had much luck. Oh well keep up the good work and we'll keep chugging along with you as best as we can. Oh! I did want to mention that my wife is 70yrs. old and I myself am 71yrs. old. Keep on walking  Thanks From Ron & Pat McCready
I lover all her videos easy for every exercise level
I Like Leslie Sansone workouts. The Leslie Sansone Walk Away the Pounds Power Series-Walk & Jog / Power Mile... are good for a quick workout.
